name: Piston Aviation
about: Piston Aviation is a comprehensive flight training school with locations in Creve Coeur, Missouri, and St. Louis Regional Airport in Bethalto. Owned by Joe and Meghen Ord, the school offers a range of programs from Discovery Flights and Private Pilot licenses to Instrument Certification, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor (CFI) training. Piston Aviation focuses on the whole student, emphasizing confidence, personal development, and a supportive environment. With industry-approved curriculum and manageable financing options, the school makes aviation careers more accessible. Known for its fun and family-oriented culture, Piston Aviation also features amenities like an arcade, flight simulators, and a runway viewing area. Dedicated to helping students achieve their dreams, Piston Aviation is committed to safety, fun, and the success of its students. Contact them to start your aviation journey today.
